CustomField.description: Show the Overall average rating of pulse based on the value of the Average Pulse Rating field
CustomField.formula: IMAGE( IF( Pulse_Average_Rating__c <1 , "/img/samples/stars_000.gif", IF(Pulse_Average_Rating__c <2, "/img/samples/stars_100.gif", IF(Pulse_Average_Rating__c <3, "/img/samples/stars_200.gif", IF(Pulse_Average_Rating__c <4, "/img/samples/stars_300.gif", IF(Pulse_Average_Rating__c <5, "/img/samples/stars_400.gif", "/img/samples/stars_500.gif" ))))), "Rating")
CustomField.label: Overall Pulse Rating
